metadata.name: The lemon
metadata.description:
Art is the fruit.


The fruit on the tree that is you.

The fruit is sweet, beautiful, and fascinatingly ripe.

The fruit will surely attract people.

The fruit has the power to fascinate people.


But don't forget.

For the tree to grow big,

you need the ground to spread your roots,

there was also the help of those who kept the water pouring in,


and you are always in that cycle. 

-----------------------------------------



This NFT work will be sold in collaboration 
with IVS x GASHO2.0.

The right to claim the actual work produced
 at GASHO2.0 will be included for the primary successful bidder of the NFT.

If you wish to receive the product
after winning the bid, 
please fill out this form to receive the product.

https://forms.gle/RVuTJ3rMFZ8kfjq4A

Auction begins Wednesday, July 6 at 7:00 PST
(Japan time July 7, 12:00~)
